function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive influence of employees in nursing professions on infection numbers","Impact":"Higher risk of infection spread in care environments","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures and regular testing for employees","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, air filtration systems","People":"Employees in nursing professions, people in care facilities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Potential association between academic share and infections","Impact":"Higher infection risk in areas with higher academic share","Mitigation":"Promote awareness and education on infection control measures in academic communities","Technologies":"Online education platforms, targeted public health campaigns","People":"Communities with high academic share","Owner":"Local government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Age demographic influence on infection numbers","Impact":"Increased infection risk with rising average age","Mitigation":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns for elderly populations","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution technology, mobile vaccination clinics","People":"Elderly population","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies"}]}
